Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.graphs.dag

Interface DAG<V,E>

Type Parameters:
V - type of each vertex;
E - type of edge attribute;
All Known Implementing Classes:
DAG_Impl
public interface DAG<V,E>
DAG interface for directed acyclic graphs.

  • Method Details

    • vertices

      SizedIterable<V> vertices()
      Get the vertices of this DAG as an Iterable.
      Returns:
      the vertices

    • edges

      SizedIterable<Edge<V,E>> edges()
      Get the edges of this DAG as a SizedIterable.
      Returns:
      the vertices

    • adjacent

      Iterable<Edge<V,E>> adjacent(V vertex)
      Get the edges which are adjacent to the given vertex.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex whose adjacent edges we want.
      Returns:
      the adjacent edges as an Iterable.

    • dfs

      void dfs(V vertex, Consumer<V> pre, Consumer<V> post)
      Implement depth-first-search on this DAG, starting at vertex.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the starting point.
      pre - a function which takes the current vertex before recursively calling dfs.
      post - a function which takes the current vertex after recursively calling dfs.

    • sorted

      Iterable<V> sorted()
      Get a topologically sorted list of vertex from this DAG.
      Returns:
      the vertices as an Iterable.
